WRITING.TEXT: It just looks so bulky to me. I wasn't expecting him to be able to fly right after he got the suit functional either.
IT WAS ME, EVERYONE! I KILLED SARA!

We need to get out of here now.
No shit, Oliver.
I liked The Duff, but it was no Mean Girls.
Serious question: Since when is Oliver okay with killing people again?
I am fucking loving all the Diggle in this episode.
I need them to pair up on a crossover episode. I *neeeeed* it.
Such a good show.

I hate boats.
I bet you do, Oliver.
Laurel. Take a lesson from Black Driver. Merlyn only fears *two* guns.
Ray was about to blow up the building by using the wrong tool. I think she should be second guessing a character when they are about to make a mistake like that.
I love it. It's like they're taking a page out of The Flash script.
Oh, shit. Ra's knows that it wasn't Oliver.

Doesn't make the scene any less heartbreaking :'(
Poor Quinten. Poor Laurel.

Hey, Sara?
Want some alcohol?
*pours out entire bottle*
I miss Laurel and Tommy :(
Oh, shit. Slade, you don't just threaten Felicity. Not to Oliver's face.

It's probably the adrenaline. Thea just found out that she shot the arrow that killed Sara and then she immediately gets jumped by the man who killed her mom in front of her. Oliver's worst fear is harm coming to Thea. I mean he fought Ra's to protect her. I imagine seeing Slade hold a gun to Thea's head would kick him into action.
Uh, speedforce?
Captain Boomerang
Thea, could you be any more obvious about your drug deals?
AWW, IT'S DIGGLE'S BROTHER!

"You're not my brother."
Weeeeeeeeeeeeeell...
Good guy, Tommy.
I miss Lance's hair.
As long as there's nothing *on* my laptop, I wouldn't even be mad. What gives me the right to deny someone the opportunity to fap?
For example, I leave my hair on the shower wall instead of immediately throwing it away.
I may or may not have bought all disposable utensils because I really hate doing the dishes.
I'm at an in-state college because of the HOPE scholarship. It's practically a full ride.
I think that's my favorite thing about living alone. I can fart whenever I want to with no one hearing/smelling it.
I feel like I'm always picking my hair off of my pillow and sheets because I loose so much of it during the night. It's really frustrating, so I know what you mean!
Shit as in actual shit or like your stuff?
By correct way, you do mean the "[over](http://imgur.com/iHLUmXm)" way, right?

WRITING.TITLE: Reddit, what makes *you* a bad roommate?

WRITING.TEXT:
Oliver's 5 years
Actually, at this point in time Oliver has had almost 8 years of fighting experience. 5 years "on the island" + 3 years of being the Arrow.

What do you think will be after Russia?
Edit: Obviously he has to end up on the island on the 5th year, but I don't know if they'd have Oliver spend another entire season on the island for flashbacks.
Hopefully Russia *fingers crossed*

**OH SHIT. IS SHE GOING TO TELL HIM?!**
Edit: Quentin, you're breaking my heart.
Edit 2: I totally thought that Laurel was going to take the easy way out and not cop to Sara being dead.
This might be my favorite episode of the season.
Dammit, Laurel. You got poisoned *again*?
DJ tried to kill Thea to hurt Merlyn. The League still thinks Oliver killed Thea.
I think she smelt the cyanide. She said red wine has been used throughout history to cover the smell of the poison.
HOLY SHIT! THEY SLEPT TOGETHER?!?!
Felicity gives the best pep talks.
Finally! Thank you Roy and Felicity for putting Oliver in his place!
I feel like Sara was just rephrasing what Oliver was telling Laurel earlier about not being a hero and being an addict.
Roy's fucking face. "What the hell is going on, man?" Perfect.

This is my favorite part.
God, I love you Felicity.
